text: "I Like It" is a song by English electronic music duo Narcotic Thrust, released as a standalone single in 2004. It was the duo's second single, after "Safe from Harm", to appear on the UK Singles Chart, debuting and peaking at number nine on 11 April 2004 to become their sole top-ten hit in the UK. The single also reached the top 20 in Flanders, Greece, the Netherlands, and Romania, as well as on three US Billboard dance charts. A music video was made for the song, featuring several female cheerleaders with red pom-poms dancing in a bright grey room filled with confetti. ==Composition== Composed in the key of F-sharp minor, "I Like It" has a tempo of 130 beats per minute. The original mix is seven minutes and twenty-five seconds long while the version released to radio is three minutes and six seconds in length. ==Track listing== UK maxi-CD # "I Like It" (Radio Edit) – 3:06 # "I Like It" (Sinewave Surfers 2am Mix) – 5:33 # "I Like It" (Original Mix) – 7:24 # "I Like It" (instrumental) – 7:24 Australian maxi-single # "I Like It" (Radio Edit) – 3:06 # "I Like It" (Sinewave Surfers Mix) – 5:34 # "I Like It" (Tom Mangan Remix) – 8:02 # "I Like It" (Original Mix) – 7:25 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2004) !Peak position |- !scope="row"|Australia (ARIA) |68 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Greece (IFPI) See Best Position column. |10 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) |13 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|US Hot Dance Singles Sales (Billboard) |11 |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2004) !Position |- !scope="row"|Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) |78 |- !scope="row"|CIS (Tophit) |48 |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Single Top 100) |76 |- !scope="row"|UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |159 |} ==References== Category:2004 singles Category:2004 songs Category:Kontor Records singles Category:Songs composed in F-sharp minor Category:Songs written by Andy Morris (musician) Category:Songs written by Stuart Crichton Category:UK Independent Singles Chart number-one singles
